name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
title: Kaedehara Kazuha: Poetics of Fuubutsu
desc: There is something elegant about this match.\nIf nothing else, both sides may concede defeat without regrets.
in_play_description: After Kaedehara Kazuha triggers Swirl with this card equipped: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kaedehara Kazuha to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When Kaedehara Kazuha is your active character, equip this card.
After Kaedehara Kazuha equips this card, he will immediately use Chihayaburu once.
After Kaedehara Kazuha triggers Swirl with this card equipped: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently)
(You must have Kaedehara Kazuha in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
